Message:
Hearing the anguished cry,
the gravely wounded witch
desperately tries to
rouse her body.

Her voice is hoarse.
She’s likely already
beyond saving.

Stuck immobile in place,
the witch looks at me
with pleading eyes.

“Please...I beg of you.
At least...spare my sister...”

—Nnnrgh...!
I couldn’t help but see
my own desperation
reflected in her.

What I’m doing now...
is exactly what those
scum did to me...

But...there’s no other
path I can take...

This is the only way...
to save my sister...!

—I pulled the trigger.
Her head jerked back with a snap,
and as though the thread of
her life had been severed,
her body lied as still as a ragdoll.

In a state of shock,
the girl squeaked out a small cry.

I ran away as fast as I could.
I...couldn’t take any more...
